response.overview: Filmed at the bachelor accommodations in the Pipera area, in Sector 2 of the capital, "For Better or Worse" is both a critique of the poor living conditions provided by the building administrators and a moralizing analysis of the inappropriate behaviors of many tenants in city life. Initially emphasizing counterexamples and directly and sharply drawing the attention of the offenders to the noticed irregularities in their habits or management, the filmmakers conclude their plea by presenting another model bachelor accommodation where cleanliness and neighborly decency replace the disorder and indifference of the former.
response.title: Și bune și rele
